attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 logo has been unveiled, it is supposed to be modern and appeal to the youth. In reality it looks disgusting and will be outdated by 2012. I am calling to scrap the logo and create a new one that really reflects british design and spirit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
